properties.entry: SELECT sum(fdi.calories) FROM food_day fd INNER JOIN food_day_item fdi ON fd.food_day_id = fdi.food_day_id WHERE fd.local_date = :localDate
INSERT INTO food_day_item (food_day_id, food_desc, meal, calories) SELECT food_day_id, :foodDesc, :meal, :calories FROM food_day WHERE local_date = :localDate
